page.title: 18POLICE FORCE ,BATH,1985
page.content: Recently, {Sean}and{Jason}carried out a survey of the police in Bath.They interviewed the police and this is what they found out. Firstly,there are approximately 100 policemen stationed in the city. They have 4 police dogs which are capable of catching a man with a 100 metres start! Everyday there are 4 cars and one motorbike out all the time on patrol. We asked P.c. O'Hagan if he had ever caught a burglar.He replied "Yes".We also asked him if he had ever used his truncheon.Again he replied "Yes".We asked him when this was, and he said it was when he went to police the miners' picket line recently. The Bath police use{computers}to help them catch criminals.The{numbers} on policemen's uniforms help to identify police officers.
